p: The ferrous ion binding capacity was monitored by the previously described method of Dinis et al. (1994) with slight modifications. Briefly, 940 μL of supernatant dilutions in distilled water were mixed with 20 μL of 2 mM ferrous chloride and incubated for 30 min at room temperature. After incubation, 200 μL of 5 mM ferrozine was added and the mixture was incubated for 10 min under the same conditions. Formation of a red ferrous ion-ferrozine complex was recorded at 562 nm.
